title: Comprehensive Health Insurance Plan
terms_and_conditions: This comprehensive health insurance policy provides extensive coverage for medical expenses. Coverage includes hospitalization, surgical procedures, doctor visits, prescription medications, and preventive care services. The policy covers inpatient and outpatient treatments, emergency room visits, and specialist consultations. Preventive services such as annual check-ups, vaccinations, and health screenings are fully covered with no deductible. The policy includes coverage for mental health services, substance abuse treatment, and rehabilitation services. Maternity care and newborn care are covered after a 10-month waiting period. The policy provides coverage for pre-existing conditions after a 12-month waiting period. Emergency medical services are covered worldwide, with a maximum coverage limit of $500,000 per year. The policy includes a deductible of $1,000 per year, after which 80% of covered expenses are paid by the insurance company. The maximum out-of-pocket expense is $5,000 per year. Exclusions include cosmetic surgery, experimental treatments, and injuries from extreme sports. The policy does not cover dental or vision care, which require separate policies. Coverage is valid for individuals and families, with family plans covering spouse and dependent children up to age 26.
